title: Naked and Sexual
description: The first episode in the ongoing saga of explicit sexual adventures of Fiona Thrust: a broadminded woman devoted to the satisfaction of her sensual needs.Fiona is besotted with the gorgeous boss of a local tea room, and gets a job as a waitress to seduce him. As she removes his clothes from his muscular body, she knows it's much more fun than drinking a cup of Earl Grey. The temperature rises when a female customer enters the shop, to the hot delight of all three.This book is explicit and detailed erotica about the lovely joy of hot and wild sex, and is intended for adults only.
author: Fiona Thrust
